Title: Promote the motive force of our physical labor -- Energy
Designer: Central People's Government Ministry of Health (中央人民政府卫生部)
Publisher: Hygiene propaganda and education materials workshop of the Central Ministry of Health (中央卫生部卫生宣传教器材制造所)
Notes: Second poster of the 1954 series "Why do we eat?" (我们为什么要吃东西?).Illustrations show the average amount of calories needed by various age groups and types of work.
